name: Bullet Beat (itch)
description:
Bullet Beat is a shoot'em up, where everything at the levels is in tune with the music, even shooting. You can also upload your track and enjoy the experimental generated levels! Keep the combo to get stronger!

Available in the game:

  • 8 different levels with unique tracks in the dubstep genre and more;
  • different types of control (mouse, keyboard or gamepad);
  • several game modes, including Chill Out mode;
  • contrary to the previous mode: hardcore generation of levels for any track;
  • infinite mode with fortress protection.

Warning! This game contains fast flashing images. It may cause discomfort and trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Gamers discretion is advised. Safety first!
